overview: Vanessa is obsessed with having sex with girls so she hooks up with Shyla. Then Vanessa's friend Remy and is seduced by evil mother Chanel. Vanessa faces excommunication form the Church for being a lesbian. Vanessa becomes the new Pope to the church. Chanel wants another baby and tells Aaliyah to have strap-on sex with Vanessa to make her pregnant with her grandfather's sperm. Bishop hears Shyla's confession which is a sacrament of lesbian love.
tagline: Drama to the highest degree. Tainted passion turns to obsessed lust!
title: Lesbian PsychoDramas 21
